title: Ayla
description: In the blink of an eye, Brooklyn is torn from Ryder's arms and thrown back into her own world...Vowing to find a way back to Necoh, she goes to dangerous lengths and embarks on a deadly mission to find her love and help him destroy Grishma once and for all.Lives will be lost, trust will be shattered, and secrets will be revealed...Will Brooklyn find Ryder?Will they finally put an end to Grishma's murderous reign?
author: Kelly Anne Blount
